entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 09:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: NE 39 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
